CustomField.formula: Annual_Spend_Rating__c + Account_Utilization_Rating__c + Potential_Opportunity_Rating__c + VALUE( TEXT( Customer_Success_Rating__c ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Tier 1 = 11 or more points Tier 2 = 9 to 10 points Tier 3 = 8 points Tier 4 = 7 points Tier 5 = Less than 7 points
CustomField.label: Growth Rating
